page.title: 11 LIFE IN RINGMORE
page.content: HOUSES This area comprises totally of privately owned houses with a small central section of well maintained thatched cottages. Around these have spread, in recent years, a number of spacious and well-built houses of modern design. PEOPLE The residents or the area are mostly middle class retired couples enjoying the peace and seclusion of the area. Some work in Newton Abbot, Teignmouth or Dawlish. AMENITIES There are no shops, garages or public houses in Ringmore. There is one telephone box and two letter boxes. The countryside behind Ringmore is made up of fields at present used mainly for horses, cattle and two donkeys.Some fields are growing oats.
